name: Google Hangouts: Hide user activity icons
description:
For use at https://hangouts.google.com

Remove distracting line of user icons at the bottom of Hangouts Group Chats

The standard chat window is only 8 icons wide but up to 150 users can be in a chat room causing near constant changes that attract your attention even though there are no new messages.
additional_info: You can choose to keep a minimum number of icons, which is useful for small chat groups where you actually want to see user activity.
